Author: miyat24
Title: [ANN]🚀💲BOUNCYCOIN 🚀💲💸Re-engineered Games of Chance 💸💲
Body: The Bouncy Token will function as a utility entry fee into the BouncyCoin game and as a dividend end point for the same token holder. In Casino partner scenarios, Casinos make money when players lose and when players win. When a player wins a match, there is a small fee incurred from winning. This fee is distributed to all Bouncy token holders. Tokens pay dividends every time * each * player wins even though this dividend is not paid immediately. Every time a fee is collected, it will be collected and distributed periodically by our smart contract. This distribution frequency will be configurable.

Author: ailyn47
Title: [ANN]🚀💲BOUNCYCOIN 🚀💲💸Re-engineered Games of Chance 💸💲
Body: Working procedures of the BouncyCoin Project.  After the demo is launched :  Zoom in with your mouse wheel. Place bets on the grid by clicking once to place and twice to acknowledge. Rotate the scene by pressing the right button of your mouse. Change the size of the table by clicking pulldown located on the left side of the table. Players send bets and enter virtual queues. Bets are made in ETH or Bouncy tokens. If the queue is not full, the game is never played. If the queue is full, the game is played. Queue Size = the maximum amount that a player can win.  https://youtu.be/Z365D0kTPGE

Author: solarisexodus
Title: [ANN]🚀💲BOUNCYCOIN 🚀💲💸Re-engineered Games of Chance 💸💲
Body: Bouncy Coin online competition consists of more than 1000 gaming companies who enjoy a 24 x 7 online  visit. Recently, there were some lottery games in the style of blockchain, which introduced the game  Statestyle Lotto on the architecture of blockchain. In particular, blockchain is used to uncover (in the source   code) random number generation algorithms (RNG). RNG is used by online casinos in  dice games , card shuffling, rotating roulette and basically every gambling process that requires mathematically   limited but vague results that are not known in advance. This online casino offers everything  traditional casino games in the browser and / or on mobile devices.  The application to be noted is Etheroll  https://www.etheroll.com/  , which took 100-sided physical bones   and applied the throw in the software in the Ethereum block chain. It has several aspects that are similar to us offers. But Etheroll does not have a “queue size”. With Etheroll, users play 1 on 1   against the casino and do not interact with other players. Our proposal requires that a person   join together in the same group with the same maximum desired gift, which we call a “queue”.
